entries.content: Just because someone reaches out as an inbound lead doesn't mean they are qualified or intend to buy.
Many inbound inquiries are from people seeking free information, not genuinely interested in purchasing a solution.
entries.notes: Identifies a common root cause for seemingly interested leads not converting.

entries.content: Charging a small fee for an initial consultation acts as a filter to isolate serious prospects from information seekers.
entries.notes: A method for clarifying intent and discovering the root cause of the inquiry (serious interest vs. free info seeking).

entries.content: Using a fee helps discover if the prospect is willing to invest even a small amount, revealing their true intent and qualification level.
entries.notes: This action serves as a form of clarifying question and root cause analysis.

focus_area: Objection Discovery: Clarifying questions, isolation, root cause
